docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: update

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

params.name: template_combinations_attributes
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: operatingsystem_ids
params.description: Array of operating system IDs to associate with the template
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: locked
params.description: Whether or not the template is locked for editing

params.name: location_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: organization_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

examples:
PUT /api/config_templates/1007981701-centos5_3_pxelinux
{
  "config_template": {
    "template": "blah"
  }
}
200
